publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2067 Donald Gorrie: Timetabling of Sewel Motions—That the Parliament urges the Parliamentary Bureau to ensure that as much parliamentary and committee time is allocated to considering each Sewel motion as would have been allocated to the issue if it was being considered as normal Scottish Parliament legislation.
S2M-2067 Timetabling of Sewel Motions (lodged on 24 November 2004) Elaine Smith*, Tommy Sheridan*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-2067 Donald Gorrie: Timetabling of Sewel Motions—That the Parliament urges the Parliamentary Bureau to ensure that as much parliamentary and committee time is allocated to considering each Sewel motion as would have been allocated to the issue if it was being considered as normal Scottish Parliament legislation. Supported by: Elaine Smith, Tommy Sheridan, Carolyn Leckie, Mike Pringle, John Swinburne*
S2M-2067 Timetabling of Sewel Motions (lodged on 24 November 2004) Chris Ballance*
